tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.Aparna Vishnumurthy is a friendly doctor and her advise is excellent. She responds at late night during emergency and her interaction with patients is nice and humble. I am fully happy with her, that to during pandamic situation, she treated me very well.  The fee and other charges are reasonable compared to other clinics/hospitals, hence  I recommend for others also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to thank Dr.Aparna for supporting me throughout my pregnancy and I felt comfortable to talk to her, She is very friendly and She took care of all the detailing’s required for a smooth and safe delivery. She understands the mindset of the patient and clarifies all their doubts. I am happy to share that we are blessed with the baby boy with normal delivery. Thank you mam for being there whenever I needed guidance and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We found Dr Aparna Patil as a good doctor and with attentive, analytical, calm, cooperative, decisive, energetic, ethical, friendly, mature, observant, responsible, skillful, trustworthy, vigilant, and wise.
It's really admirable how she always see her patients through from conception to completion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
Dr. Aparna is very caring to her all patients.She always explain all the queries and spent quality time to her patient.We engaged with her from the pregnancy planning to delivery till date.We really appreciate her contribution to our life.
Thank you Dr. Aparna Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She is very friendly, having excellent experience in her area and gives proper guidance. She had supported very well during delivery, given proper instructions to nurses and came on time at Hospital and spent more than five hours with proper monitoring. Delivery was normal. We are very thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience was with doctor was so fantastic and she was able to analyse my health issue so quickly. We have seen the result in just two month and I am able to get conceive in just two months. Now I have second baby so I am very much greatful to the doctor for helping me to make my family complete.
